title: IoT Technology in Industrial Automation
excerpt: Exploring how IoT technology is transforming traditional industrial automation systems
content: IoT technology is profoundly changing the landscape of industrial automation, injecting new vitality into traditional manufacturing.
By connecting sensors, controllers, and gateway devices, enterprises can build a complete data collection and control network.
This network not only enables remote monitoring and control of devices but also collects vast amounts of operational data for analysis and optimization.
Our IoT gateway product is designed specifically to meet this need, capable of connecting various industrial devices for unified data collection and transmission.
author: Engineer Li
